formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: UnpauseMonitor Synopsis: Unpause monitoring of a channel Privilege: call,all Description: The 'UnpauseMonitor' action may be used to re-enable recording of a channel after calling PauseMonitor. The following parameters may be used to control this: Channel - Required. Used to specify the channel to record.
